remarks: Basic continuity property of a continuous functional.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cnfnc $p |- ( ( T e. ConFn /\ A e. ~H /\ B e. RR+ ) -> E. x e. RR+ A. y e. ~H ( ( normh ` ( y -h A ) ) < x -> ( abs ` ( ( T ` y ) - ( T ` A ) ) ) < B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
